use-window-width.name: Use Window Width For Resolution Width

resolution-width.name: Resolution Width
resolution-width.description: The width of the image, if not using the window's width.

use-window-height.name: Use Window Height For Resolution Height

resolution-height.name: Resolution Height
resolution-height.description: The height of the image, if not using the window's height.

jpeg-mafia.name: Output to JPEG
jpeg-mafia.description: Use JPEG for images instead of PNG

auto-screenshot.name: Auto Screenshot
auto-screenshot.description: Automatically take a screenshot with a given percentage interval (for Classic levels) or a timed interval in seconds (for Platformer levels).

auto-percent.name: Auto Screenshot Percentage Interval (Classic levels)
auto-percent.description: Set the percentage interval for automatic screenshots in Classic levels.

auto-seconds.name: Auto Screenshot Seconds Interval (Platformer levels)
auto-seconds.description: Set the timed interval in seconds for automatic screenshots in Platformer levels.
